There were no other sightings in Tacoma on or around May 28th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi went outside my back porch to gather some herbs for a late dinner. when i was heading back into the house, i noticed a rather large reddish-orange\yellow round object near the moon. it looked really unusual so i stopped to watch it. it appeared to move slowly westward in the sky. i got excited so i yelled for my husband to come here quickly! he also thought it was very peculiar so he went in to grab the camera, while i did not want to take my eyes off it. it looked like a fireball to me, but it moved so slowly and in a controlled fashion from east to west. i suspect it was not a meteor. it definitely was not an airplane or helicopter. it was completely silent. i stayed to watch it as it faded from sight, still hight in the air several minutes later. i wonder if anyone else saw this thing? i saw it from the tacoma area, on the south end of tacoma. it appeared brighter with the naked eye than the picture i have included. by the time he got the camera, it was further away than when i first saw it.
